import './CSS/Boards.css'; import Cookie from 'js-cookie'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { get_Requests } from './Utilities/Request'; export function Boards(){ const [token , setToken] = useState(Cookie.get('tl-token')); // set to initial value const read_all_tasks = async()=>{ token = JSON.parse(Cookie.get('tl-token')).token; let result = await get_Requests("api/Boards/All_Boards" , {"content-type" : "application/json" , "X-token" : token}) } useEffect(()=>{read_all_tasks()}, []) return(<>
